exposedVariables.value: ToolJet is an open-source low-code platform for building and deploying internal tools with minimal engineering efforts 🚀

options.query:
SELECT table_name
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE table_schema = 'public'
AND table_type = 'BASE TABLE';
